org.intermine.task

Class ReadResourceTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tools.ant.ProjectComponent
      • org.apache.tools.ant.Task
        • org.intermine.task.ReadResourceTask

  • public class ReadResourceTask
extends org.apache.tools.ant.Task
    A Task that reads a resource (from the class path) and sets a property with its contents. It can set a property to be the contents of a file in the class path.

    • Field Summary
